extreme_forest.Rd

Fit an extremal random forest ... !!! write description

extreme_forest(X, Y, min.node.size, lambda, intermediate_estimator, ...)

Arguments

X

(numeric matrix)
Y

(numeric vector)
min.node.size

(numeric \(\geq\) 0)
lambda

(numeric \(\geq\) 0)
intermediate_estimator

!!! document this
...

!!! document this

Value

An object with S3 class "extreme_forest", that is a named list with the following elements.

quantile_forest

An object with S3 class "quantile_forest". See grf::quantile_forest().

intermediate_estimator

An object with arbitrary S3 class that possesses the "predict" method. Such "predict" method must accept as second argument a numeric matrix with the test predictors, e.g., newdata. For example, predict(intermediate_estimator, newdata, ...) must execute with no errors.

min.node.size

!!! document this

lambda

!!! document this
